title: ‘Are you Prince Harry’s father?’

organizations.name: news corp australia network share share on twitter

text:
James Hewitt says he is not Prince Harry’s dad in Sunday Night exclusive March 13, 2017 1:11am Image Prince Harry Is Opening Up About His Mother Princess Diana's Death For the First Time 1:08 
Prince Harry has recently opened up about his mother Princess Diana's death and the 31 year old regrets not doing it sooner. July 27th 2016 James Hewitt says he is not Prince Harry’s father. Picture: Channel 7 Staff writers News Corp Australia Network Share Share on Twitter 
PRINCESS Diana’s former love, James Hewitt, has finally answered the question that has intrigued royal observers for years. 
In an exclusive interview with Sunday Night Mr Hewitt was asked by host Melissa Doyle if he is Prince Harry’s biological father. 
“No I’m not,” he replied. 
Sunday Night interviewed Mr Hewitt at his farm in Devon, southwest England, where he and Diana had spent time during their affair. Diana, Princess of Wales presenting trophy to James Hewitt at polo match in the mid-nineties. Picture: Supplied Source: News Corp Australia 
He painted a portrait of a simple life, saying they walked along the beach and cooked together. 
“Well, I’d cook and she’d wash up. Just dinner and relaxing and laughing,” he said. 
Mr Hewitt had an affair with the princess when he was an officer in the British army. At the time rumours were circulating that Prince Charles was also having an affair with his current wife, Camilla Parker-Bowles. Rumours have circulated that Prince Harry was Mr Hewitt’s son after media speculated on the physical resemblance between the two. Picture: AFP Source: AFP 
He and Diana were forced apart when Mr Hewitt was deployed to serve in the Gulf War. 
They parted for good when the affair was exposed in the media. 
Since then rumours have circulated that Prince Harry was Mr Hewitt’s son after media speculated on the physical resemblance between the two. 
“It sells papers,” he said. “It’s worse for him (Harry) probably, poor chap.” Sunday Night interviewed Mr Hewitt at his farm in Devon, southwest England. Picture: Channel Seven. Source: Supplied 
Recalling about falling in love with the princess, Mr Hewitt said: “Well, yes. It’s a gradual period and then, you know, suddenly you can’t get enough of each other or see each other as much as you want.” 
Sunday Night also interviewed Diana’s bodyguard Ken Wharfe, who slept on a camp bed in a hallway outside the bedroom the princess shared with her lover. 
Mr Wharfe said “it was pretty obvious what was happening” but that “it wasn’t for me to moralise on this.” Prince Charles was also rumoured to have had an affair during his marriage to Diana. Picture: AP Source: AP 
He went on: “I didn’t really have a view on it openly or inwardly, you know. It was her life, their life. I was there for one specific reason, I would never let her down.” 
The Sunday Night show also featured an interview with Diana’s former butler, Paul Burrell. 
Mr Burrell claimed to be in possession of a letter from the princess which he received from her in the months before her death in a car crash in Paris in 1997 and in which, he said, she prophesied her own death. Diana’s former butler, Paul Burrell, showed Channel 7 a letter from the princess which he said she prophesied her own death. Picture: Channel Seven. Source: Supplied 
Quoting from the letter, Mr Burrell said: “This particular phase in my life is the most dangerous. My husband is planning ‘an accident’ in my car, brake failure and serious head injury in order to make the path clear for him to marry Camilla.” 
Mr Burrell said that the fears expressed in the letter came to her after she visited clairvoyants. 
“Some of these thoughts did come from mystics but you can’t get away from the fact that she wrote it. She took time to sit down and actually write down her fears.” Princess Diana's butler Paul Burrell comes out as gay 0:33 
Paul Burrell was Princess Diana's butler for ten years, and she was said to be the only person who knew about his sexuality. Now, Paul has come out as gay, and reveals he is marrying his long-term boyfriend. March 8th 2017
